intro: Elatinella alsinastrum, commonly known as the slender bedstraw, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Caryophyllaceae. It is characterized by its small, delicate flowers that typically bloom in shades of pink or white. The plant has thin, wiry stems and small, oval-shaped leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. It is typically found in moist, disturbed soils in temperate regions. Elatinella alsinastrum is an annual herb that plays a role in stabilizing soil and providing habitat for small invertebrates.
